title: The Dirtiest Block
summaries: The Dirtiest Block is a pet-summoning item that spawns The Dirtiest Block pet that follows the player around.

It can be found extremely rarely as a <linked>block</linked> that looks identical to <linked>Dirt Blocks</linked>. Upon world generation, 3 (in a <linked>small</linked> world), 6 (medium), or 9 (large) random Dirt Blocks will be replaced with The Dirtiest Blocks.

statistics.Sell: 2 SC
